item.description: Sonarqube version: '2' services: postgres: image: postgres:9.6 networks: - sonarqube environment: POSTGRES_USER: sonar POSTGRES_PASSWORD: sonarpasswd volumes: - ~/postgresql/data sonarqube: image: sonarqube:7.9.5-community ports: - "9000:9000" - "9092:9092" networks: - sonarqube environment: SONARQUBE_JDBC_USERNAME: sonar SONARQUBE_JDBC_PASSWORD: sonarpasswd SONARQUBE_JDBC_URL: "jdbc:postgresql://postgres:5432/sonar" SONAR_SEARCH_JAVAADDITIONALOPTS: "-Xmx4096m -Xms2048m" SONAR_SCANNER_OPTS: "-Xmx4096m" depends_on: - postgres networks: sonarqube:
